document_data.name: Faerdinalar
document_data.sex: MaleThe word "enchantress" used throughout, the use of the title "Enchanter" is assumed to convey his sex.
document_data.mainbody: '''Faerdinalar''' the Enchanter was a famous mage sometime on or before the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was once the master of two different [[Magister]]s: [[Thornar Fleetmoor]] and [[Uldinus Lawkland]].
